data.name: Slam Dome
data.detailed_description:
In the year 2XXX, the value of humanity has plummeted. The only chance to find success and to escape poverty is to compete in the "Slam Dome." A post-apocalyptic game show. Where you face swarms of enemies and bosses to reach the top of the game show leaderboards and achieve fame and fortune. But, will the producers truly allow this? Only one way to find out.

Slam Dome is a co-op action roguelike that revels in the era of badly translated arcade games and television. Equip yourself with insane weapons and gear to try to survive this top down online multiplayer experience.

"Hey guys! Are you ready to slam?"

Key Features
  • 4 playable customizable Classes.
  • Unlimited weapons and skill combinations.
  • Tons of loot and collectables.
  • Unique gear with unlimited stat possibilities.
  • Continual updates with more content each month including new maps, characters, items, skills, bosses and enemies.
  • Community driven items, maps, stats and more.
  • Multiplayer co-op with up to 4 players.
  • In game and out of game currency for character customization.
  • Multiple levels, items and enemies with scaling difficulty.
  • XTREME REPLAYABILITY!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Sound Card: DirectX 8 or higher compatible.
